data.description: Our Everyday Retirement Account is a simple, low fee personal banking account designed for pensioners and retirees, who want the ability to earn more interest than with a traditional transaction account.
data.name: Everyday Retirement Account

fees.name: Periodical payment fee
fees.additionalInfo: For a transfer to another financial institution. Fee applies once free ATM withdrawals, periodical payments and staff assisted transfers have been used.

fees.name: Staff assisted transfer fee
fees.additionalInfo: Staff assisted transfer to another financial institution (excluding Bendigo Bank). Fee applies once free ATM withdrawals, periodical payments and staff assisted transfers have been used.

fees.name: Bank@Post™ deposit or  withdrawal fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee applies once free Bank@Post, branch withdrawals and staff assisted transfers have been used.

fees.name: Branch withdrawal fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee applies once free Bank@Post, branch withdrawals and staff assisted transfers have been used.

fees.name: Staff assisted transfer fee
fees.additionalInfo: Staff assisted transfer to a Rural Bank account. Fee applies once free Bank@Post, branch withdrawals and staff assisted transfers have been used.

fees.name: ATM withdrawal fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee applies once free ATM withdrawals have been used.

fees.name: VISA cash advance
fees.additionalInfo: Applies to each Visa Debit card withdrawal you make over the counter at any participating financial institution (excludes transactions performed at any Bendigo Bank branch)

fees.name: International VISA cash advance
fees.additionalInfo: Applies to each Visa Debit card withdrawal you make over the counter or at an ATM outside of Australia. Note: the foreign currency conversion fee also applies

fees.name: Foreign currency conversion fee
fees.additionalInfo: A foreign currency conversion fee of 2% of the Australian dollar amount applies when a purchase or cash advance is performed in a foreign currency. Note: the International Visa cash advance fee also applies for cards used overseas

fees.name: Visa Debit card replacement fee in Australia via Registered Post
Visa Debit card replacement fee in Australia via Express Post
Visa Debit card replacement fee outside Australia
Bank cheque fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies per bank cheque you request. Bank cheques are organised through the Commonwealth Bank of Australia or Bendigo Bank

fees.name: Bank cheque repurchase or stop fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies per bank cheque you request to be repurchased or stopped

fees.name: Cheque stop fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you request a stop payment be placed on a cheque from your cheque book. Fee applies per cheque written or per series of cheques if the cheque book is lost or stolen

fees.name: Cheque book via Express Post
fees.additionalInfo: Applies per cheque book you request to be sent via Express Post

fees.name: Cheque encashment establishment fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when a cheque encashment arrangement is established with another financial institution. Arrangement is for a maximum of 2 years

fees.name: Single cheque encashment fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies for each cheque you ask us to arrange to be cashed at a branch of another financial institution

fees.name: Real time electronic or international funds transfer
fees.additionalInfo: Applies the same day you request a transfer to an account at another financial institution in Australia, or an international funds transfer

fees.name: Outward cheque dishonour fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies per cheque written on your account that is dishonoured due to insufficient funds

fees.name: Direct debit dishonour fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies per unsuccessful direct debit attempt on your account due to insufficient funds

fees.name: Copy of a cheque
fees.additionalInfo: Applies per cheque when you request a copy of a cheque deposited to your account

fees.name: Electronic or cheque trace
fees.additionalInfo: Applies per request to trace a Bpay®, Pay Anyone (including Osko®) or other transaction sent electronically to another financial institution or a cheque written on your account. A copy of the cheque is provided with this request. The trace fee will be waived if the trace reveals an error by Rural Bank

fees.name: Real time electronic or international funds trace
fees.additionalInfo: Applies per request. Note: The receiving bank may also impose a fee. The trace fee will be waived if the trace reveals an error by Rural Bank

fees.name: Electronic recall
fees.additionalInfo: Applies per attempt to recall an electronic transaction. The fee is charged even if the recall is unsuccessful

fees.name: Audit request
fees.additionalInfo: Applies per audit requested on an account

fees.name: Transaction history record
fees.additionalInfo: Applies per request per statement period for a transaction history print out on an account

fees.name: Administration fee
fees.additionalInfo: An administration fee of $15.00 per 1/4 hour applies for the supply of information, retrieval of a voucher or other documentation, or other special services you request

fees.name: Pre-carbonated duplicate deposit book
fees.additionalInfo: Applies per book requested

fees.name: Dormant account
fees.additionalInfo: Charged annually to accounts that have not had a customer initiated deposit or withdrawal for 3 years or more

fees.name: Physical security token (issue and replacement)
fees.additionalInfo: Key-ring sized token that improves the security of Internet Banking. Applies per token ordered

eligibility.additionalInfo: Must be at least 16 years of age or over to have a VISA Debit card or access to Internet and Phone Banking (excluding Pay Anyone)
Must be 18 years of age or over for access to a chequebook

eligibility.additionalValue: Only available to Australian residents with an Australian address

eligibility.additionalInfo: Pensioner Concession Card holders in receipt of an eligible Centrelink pension or allowance or a Veterans’ Affairs pension or allowance. Eligible pensions and allowances include: Aged pension, Disability Support pension, Carer's pension, Wife's pension, Widow's pension, Veteran's pension, Mature Age allowance

eligibility.additionalValue: At least one account holder must 55 years of age or over, or hold a Pensioner Concession Card

features.additionalInfo: Available to anyone aged 55 and over, or a Pensioner Concession Card holder
EFTPOS and access to Bendigo ATM networks
Rural Bank Visa Debit Card to access your funds through ATMs, EFTPOS or online shopping
Transact at Australia Post retail outlets displaying the Bank@Post™ symbol (fee applies)

lendingRates.additionalValue: Applies to any unauthorised overdrawn balance on the account
